website_summaries.verdict: This scratch- and water-resistant vape travel case will serve you well consistently.
pros: Features an elastic strap to hold your vape device in place at all times
Boasts premium felt lining that offers outstanding protection against scratches and other damage
Hard-shell case will maintain its appearance over time
cons: Not big enough for some users
Ring that attaches to the zipper may fall off

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice but i write for a small vape pen and this is way too big
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: ... TASCAM DR-8 recorder and this turned out to be perfect. Holds the recorder
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case for my TASCAM DR-8 recorder and this turned out to be perfect. Holds the recorder, a couple packs of batteries, the USB cable, and a clip.
customer_reviews.author: GeezerCaveman

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: The case is beautifully crafted howver in my seco d day the hand strap has snap off, that is super poor quality i will not recommended to anyone buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Saleh22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for E-cig/ E-Go style vaporizers.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Grenco Science GPen vaporizor. This case is absolutely perfect for it. The extra battery, USB charger and wall wart fit in the right section (the one with the elastic). Two 15ml needle bottles, extra tank, three pack of atomizers fits in the pouch section, and the hard outer case makes sure nothing is damaged or squeezed to leaking. Fantastic, should advertise this for e-cigs more prominently. The sizing is perfect even when I have battery and tank connected.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Sorosky

customer_reviews.title: It would be great if it fit my purpose
customer_reviews.text: it works and it's well built but it's bit short for the EC unit I have.
customer_reviews.author: Shark

customer_reviews.title: Both were excellent and exactly what I wanted in that particular case ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two cases for travel, this and another one. Both were excellent and exactly what I wanted in that particular case design and size. Very satisfied with design and looks are great.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting and keeps all my vape supplies safe and organized. Perfect for my life in the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising - NOT a hard case
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a hard case to protect the unit. It's squishy and I can bend it easily in either direction. This will not protect my unit at all. I posted a review with photos and a video and somehow they're mysteriously gone now. I will keep posting reviews because this is NOT accurate and they shouldn't be allowed to make false claims. If I could give it less than 1 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my vaping supplies while im at work or on the go and it gets the job done and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Ford

customer_reviews.title: A keeper!
customer_reviews.text: After three+ years it's still going strong. Although I pulled out the ring that held the leash, I stitched it up and put a keyring in as a zipper pull. I am ordering one for my sister. It's very protective and I have never had to worry about my phone breaking.
customer_reviews.author: soupy

product_meta.title: USA Gear Electronic Cigarette eCig Vape Hard Shell Travel Case with Wrist Strap - Works with V2, VaporFi, Halo and More Electronic Cigarettes - Weather and Scratch Resistant Design
feature_bullets: DURABLE HARD SHELL VAPE CASE: Weather resistant protection for your V2, Vaporfi, Halo, Mig Cigs, Apollo, blu, NJOY, Innokin and more
SECURE FIT E-CIG STRAP: Elastic strap holds your device in place and reduces the impact of bumps and drops
SCRATCH RESISTANT INTERIOR: Premium felt lining protects your ecig case from abrasive damage and features a mesh pouch for storing cables and accessories
Interior Dimensions - 5.5 x 3.5 x 1.25" - Includes detachable wrist strap
Backed by the USA GEAR 3-Year Manufacturer's Warranty!
